Detailed Description

Interface for objects that give the dynamics of a certain state-action pair in the standard MDP representation.

Note that this differs from StateActionModel in that it gives the effects of an action as a distribution over successor states, not as a distribution over Effect objects.

virtual double MDPStateAction::reward (  )  const [pure virtual]

Returns:
The estimated reward for executing the modeled action at the modeled state.

Implemented in MDP::State::Action.

virtual const StateDistribution& MDPStateAction::successor_probabilities (  )  const [pure virtual]

The probabilities of each successor for the modeled state and action.

The caller may subscribe to this StateActionModel to be notified about changes to this structure.

Returns:
A mapping in which the keys are pointers to states and the data are the corresponding transition probabilities.

Implemented in MDP::State::Action.
